1.0.name: wordpress/qq-connect
1.0.description:
*use tencent micro bo account login WordPress blog, tencent micro bo connected in a message box, plugin registration, the login page will join use tencent micro bo connection button, you want a few clicks, then to tecent micro bo simply verifying can use tencent micro bo account login WordPress blog.

*synchronous message to tecent micro bo, tencent micro bo connected in a message box plugin increase an option, allow the user to select whether his message synchronization to tecent micro bo, convenient user tracking its online behavior, tencent micro bo as their own lifestream one way.

*synchronous logs to tecent micro bo, tencent micro bo connection plug-in can let WordPress administrator bind a tencent micro Po's account, and then blog diary update, automatic updates a micro bo (title + links) to tecent micro bo.
